description: Create a lo0 without an IP assigned.
script:
config system interface
  edit "lo0"
    set type loopback
    set vdom "root"
    set allowaccess ping
    set description "Create lo0 for monitor test"
  next
end

description: Create a Loopback0 `lo0` via the `Config DB`.
script:
config system interface
  edit "lo0"
    set type loopback
    set vdom "root"
    set allowaccess ping
    set description "Create lo0 for monitor test"
  next
end

description: Script Template to create create VLANs on a Device DB using the metadata variables `site_subnet`, `vlan_count`, and `vlan_cidr`.

Use the FMG API `/pm/config/device/{{record.devname}}/global/system/interface` to retrieve the FortiGate interfaces and put them into an attribute for jinja names `interfaces`. 

Iterate through these interfaces and show a table of interfaces.
